message: Let's split this fairly. I'm offering you a good sum, take it!
I'm feeling generous, Alice. Let's make a deal and avoid the risk of inflation eating our money!
Okay, Bob, let's try this again. I'm being a little more generous this time. Take it or leave it.
Alice, let's be real. A 50/50 split is the fairest and fastest way to end this.  We're both losing money with each round!
